works.description:
"Epoch chemotherapy is used in the treatment of complicated cancers. This chemotherapy treatment is generally used where the malignancies and the tumors are worsened and gets complicated due to the other conditions of health. As the name suggests, in this treatment the drugs are applied to the body by the process of chemotherapy. The epoch chemotherapy generally includes a blend of and a mixture of different toxic drugs.

The toxic drugs which are included in the epoch chemotherapy treatment are Etoposide, doxorubicin, vincristine, prednisone, and cycolophosphamide. ", is infringed
